alert.note: Alert for Northern Harrison; Southern Harrison (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 29 at 3:02PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF CENTRAL HARRISON COUNTY THROUGH 345 PM CDT... At 302 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Lyman, or 8 miles north of Gulfport, moving northwest at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Gulfport, Biloxi, D`iberville, Saucier, Lyman, and Gulfport Airport. This includes Interstate 10 in Mississippi between mile markers 32 and 45. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
